overview: Buster is falsely accused of breaking a window by a woman and is taken into a courtroom. Thinking that Buster and the woman are engaged, the judge mistakenly marries them and Buster is quickly taken home by the woman to meet her family. At first unwelcoming, the family begins to treat Buster nice when they come to believe that he is going to inherit a large sum of money.
tagline: She scared him into marrying her-and then her relations scared him into divorce. Of all his wife's relations he loved himself the best.
title: My Wife's Relations
